Bonjour!

I am a Distinguished Scientist in Modeling and Simulation at the [Roche Innovation Center in Basel](https://www.roche.ch/en/standorte/basel-hq.htm), in Basel. 
In this role, I convert data into insights using various statistical models and programming techniques. I am an <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i> + <i class="fa-brands fa-github"></i> enthusiast!

In these pages, you will find some information about my current professional engagement, as well as past oral presentations.

My contributions to scientific articles are listed on these [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=JZwKfSkAAAAJ&hl=en) and [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5685-1408) profiles.
